# WKWebExtension.MessagePort

**Class**

An object that manages message-based communication with a web extension.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class MessagePort
```

## Overview

Contains properties and methods to handle message exchanges with a web extension.

## Structures

- **WKWebExtension.MessagePort.Error**: Constants that indicate errors in the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtension/MessagePort] domain.

## Instance Properties

- **applicationIdentifier**: The unique identifier for the app to which this port should be connected.
- **disconnectHandler**: The block to be executed when the port disconnects.
- **isDisconnected**: Indicates whether the message port is disconnected.
- **messageHandler**: The block to be executed when a message is received from the web extension.

## Instance Methods

- **disconnect()**: Disconnects the port, terminating all further messages.
- **disconnect(throwing:)**: Disconnects the port, terminating all further messages with an optional error.
- **sendMessage(_:completionHandler:)**: Sends a message to the connected web extension.

## Classes

- **WKWebExtension.Action**: An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension action.
- **WKWebExtension.Command**: An object that encapsulates the properties for an individual web extension command.
- **WKWebExtension.DataRecord**: An object that represents a record of stored data for a specific web extension context.
- **WKWebExtension.MatchPattern**: An object that represents a way to specify groups of URLs.
- **WKWebExtension.TabConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a tab in an extension.
- **WKWebExtension.WindowConfiguration**: An object that encapsulates configuration options for a window in an extension.
- **WKWebExtensionController.Configuration**: A [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebExtensionController/Configuration-swift.class] object with which to initialize a web extension controller.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
